Theme Description:

Simple Sidebar is a basic sidebar menu page layout for Bootstrap websites with off canvas navigation on smaller screen sizes.

Theme Features:

  • Responsive Bootstrap sidebar navigation
  • Off-canvas navigation toggling on smaller screens
  • Responsive page content area
